General.Name: Swiss Water Decaffeinated Coffee Inc
General.Description: Swiss Water Decaffeinated Coffee Inc. operates as a green coffee decaffeinator in Canada, the United States, and internationally. It decaffeinates and sells green coffees to specialty roaster retailers, specialty coffee importers, and commercial coffee roasters, as well as sells coffees through regional distributors. The company decaffeinates coffees without the use of chemicals. It also provides a range of green coffee logistics services, including devanning coffee received from origin; inspecting, weighing, and sampling coffees; and storing, handling, and preparing green coffee for outbound shipments. In addition, the company handles and stores coffees for various other coffee importers and brokers. The company was formerly known as Ten Peaks Coffee Company Inc. and changed its name to Swiss Water Decaffeinated Coffee Inc. in September 2018. Swiss Water Decaffeinated Coffee Inc. is headquartered in Delta, Canada.
General.Address: 7750 Beedie Way, Delta, BC, Canada, V4G 0A5
